name: Days Inn Lubbock South

reviews.title: Very Nice for a Nice Price
reviews.text: I called to make a reservation ahead of time and we got in around midnight. Every staff member I dealt with was very nice and helpful. I read here that it was hard to find, so I got directions when I made the reservation which was most helpful--better than google maps. The room was SO comfortable. It seemed new or newly renovated--but it was even nicely decorated. Such a nice price. Breakfast had waffles--Texas shaped--as a Texan, I thought it was cute. Close to the Buddy Holly museum and wineries. I wish every budget hotel I stayed in was like this. As dedicated budget travelers, this experience was a nice little relaxing surprise.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for my husband's graduation from Texas Tech. If you are direction challenged, you might need to call the hotel before going here or study your map first (you might get lost).
reviews.title: LOVED IT!!!

reviews.text: For the price, oh...we saved a lot from my company's discount deals with YOU DECIDE and we got a very good deal - free breakfast, wi-fi, room service everyday with fresh towels!!!, quiet surroundings, security cameras.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Customer service was great. Bed was firm and pillows were soft, newly renovated rooms and the bathrooms - all clean! I like the paint colors of the room as well as it has its ref and microwave and coffee maker as well as hairdryer too, An indoor heated pool was a plus.
reviews.title: Absolute Nightmare

reviews.text: Oh one let down though - there was nothing, no equipment nor machine inside the fitness room!!! But it's ok we hardly had time to use one though we thought we can squeeze a quick 30 min sweat out!
reviews.title: good price, a little hard to get to, adequate room, dog-friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recently stayed at Days Inn South in Lubbock to attend my sons wedding. I had booked my stay with an internet travel company. I was a bit concerned with the hotel when i had looked over its reviews. Well to say when i arrived i was very impressed. The first impression is the front desk. He was very kind and professional. The second impression was the large atruim, which resembles a graet church roof. Our room was located inside the hotel right beside a wonderful waterfall fountain. The room was very clean. The beds were both comfprtable. The room i felt was worth twice the price i had paid online. All in all Days in South hotel and suites provided me with a enjoyable stay. My wife and I are reserved there for a summer stay, and we are excited to return. thank you Day Inn Staff!
reviews.title: Clean Hotel

reviews.text: I travel to Lubbock two times a month and stay for several days each time. This hotel was completely remodeled recently, and each room is very nice. The service is excellent, they already know my name. The breakfast is quick and not much unless you like waffles and donuts. Would recommend this to any business traveler stopping in Lubbock.
reviews.title: Outstanding hotel and a great value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed here two nites while in Lubbock for a Texas Tech game....staff was excellent from check-in to check-out...room was large, bed very comfortable, newly refurbished hotel for a reasonable price!!! free breakfast
reviews.title: great room and great price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we were very pleased with the people at the hotel. they came by later to see if all was as we expected and it was. the location is perfect right on hwy. 84easy to find.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.text: the room was clean and well stocked with towels, soap, shampooeverything was great.
reviews.title: Cleanliness

reviews.text: Wow, I was amazed that this is a Days Inn. My kids loved the pool and I loved that it was in a large open lobby area. I will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Beautiful Lobby...

reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend the Days Inn-Lubbock, Texas. The staff was the most professional, helpful and courteous. Our company sets up classes in all parts of the USA and has many out of town clients to attend these classes, I have to say this was one of the best stays our group has experienced. Great conference rooms with the most accommodating staff. Truly a great experience. Thank-you so much for making this trip a success.
reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE IN ALL OUR TRAVELS

reviews.text: Sincerely, Teri Drapeau / Nationwide Crane Training
reviews.title: This is a great hotel for the price.
Smelled like B.O.
reviews.text: This is a well kept secret , but it won't be kept long. The hotel has undergone a through remodeling and redecorating that keeps with the Red Raider Inn theme and more luxurious decor.It has become a First Class facility in the most convient location in Lubbock.They are doing a "soft opening" right now, but as soon as the savvy traveler discovers the value , it will be in strong demand.

reviews.title: This motel was filthy
reviews.text: I've been in some dirty hotels before but none that have stunk as bad as this one. The whole room stunk of body odor. I was too tired and unfamiliar with the area to leave so I just jerked the comforter off of the bed and slept in my clothes. I am still amazed at how bad the room smelled. I don't understand how an entire room can smell like a sweaty armpit.

description: We have recently undergone a complete remodel of the hotel. We offer 80 rooms of single King and double Queen type rooms. We also have 8 King whirlpool suites included in the 80 rooms offering. A free Daybreak breakfast, indoor pool and business center are just a few of the amenities that will compliment your stay. If you have stayed at the Days Inn South before we invite you to come and see our upgrades. You will be pleasantly surprised. We offer smoking rooms and we are pet friendly so bring the entire family.
